signature: <T> Collection<T> select(final Iterable<? extends T> inputCollection, final Predicate<? super T> predicate)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before performing collection operations.
The predicate must be initialized before it can be used in the select method.
The result of the select method should be verified against the predicate to ensure correctness.
The output collection should be compared with an expected output to validate the select operation.
